# The `InlineFunctionInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class captures the data input to the InlineFunction call, and records the auxiliary results produced by it. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::InlineFunctionInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class captures the data input to the InlineFunction call, and records the auxiliary results produced by it.

Definition at line 268 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/cloning-h">Cloning.h</a>.

### InlinedCalls {#ae6918eedce7edea74c67aa164a7d198d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;WeakTrackingVH, 8&gt; llvm::InlineFunctionInfo::InlinedCalls</>}>
InlineFunction fills this in with callsites that were inlined from the callee.

This is only filled in if CG is non-null.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/cloning-h/#l00290">290</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/cloning-h">Cloning.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### InlinedCallSites {#afee77c39305987451e9495b749863d07}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;CallBase &#42;, 8&gt; llvm::InlineFunctionInfo::InlinedCallSites</>}>
All of the new call sites inlined into the caller.

&#39;InlineFunction&#39; fills this in by scanning the inlined instructions, and only if CG is null. If CG is non-null, instead the value handle <code>InlinedCalls</code> above is used.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/cloning-h/#l00297">297</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/cloning-h">Cloning.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### UpdateProfile {#a2479f3ea47eee2627b24bddfa6333415}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::InlineFunctionInfo::UpdateProfile">
Update profile for callee as well as cloned version.

We need to do this for regular inlining, but not for inlining from sample profile loader.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/cloning-h/#l00301">301</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/cloning-h">Cloning.h</a>.
